title: Mountain Lion Basketball Student-Athlete Endowed Scholarship Fund
description: To provide scholarship awards, which may include research-related expenses, for  student-athletes enrolled at UCCS.  Recipients will be members of a NCAA UCCS sponsored basketball team and have a minimum GPA of at least 3.0.
marketingContent: To provide scholarship awards, which may include research-related expenses, for student-athletes enrolled at UCCS. Recipients will be members of a NCAA UCCS sponsored basketball team and have a minimum GPA of at least 3.0.
